sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import Typography from '@material-ui/core/Typography'; import './Policy.css' import { Grid } from '@material-ui/core'; const PolicyContent = (props) => { return ( {props.content} ); } const Policy = () => { return ( PRIVACY POLICY Information we collect How we collect payment information Information collected by automated means How we use the information we collect Information we share Your rights and choices How we protect personal information Updates to our policy If you have any concerns or questions please email us at info.tempify@gmail.com ); } export default Policy;
